skills.name: React Best Practices
skills.description: Comprehensive performance optimization guide for React and Next.js applications from Vercel. Contains 40+ rules across 8 categories: eliminating waterfalls (CRITICAL), bundle size optimization (CRITICAL), server-side performance, client-side data fetching, re-render optimization, rendering performance, advanced patterns, and JavaScript performance
skills.author: Vercel

skills.name: React Native: FlatList & FlashList (CRITICAL)
skills.description: Replace ScrollView with virtualized lists (FlatList/FlashList) to prevent FPS drops and memory issues. Critical for any list rendering in React Native
skills.author: Callstack

skills.name: React Native: Avoid Barrel Imports (CRITICAL)
skills.description: Avoid barrel file imports to reduce bundle size. Import directly from source files instead of index.js/index.ts re-exports
skills.author: Callstack

skills.name: React Native: JS Bundle Analysis (CRITICAL)
skills.description: Analyze and visualize JavaScript bundle to identify large dependencies and optimization opportunities using source-map-explorer
